origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'IndustryAPI.compare_standards', 'description': 'This function compares company performance against industry standards based on the industry type, company name, and type of standard.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industryType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of industry, e.g., technology, manufacturing.'}, {'name': 'companyName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'standardType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of standard to compare against, e.g., best_practices, regulatory.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'comparisonResult', 'description': 'The result of the industry comparison.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 IndustryAPI.compare_standards, 它的参数输入如下: 'industryType'是'technology', 'companyName'是'TechCorp', 'standardType'是'best_practices'.
